Package com.solana.pay

Class SolanaPayURI

java.lang.Object
com.solana.pay.SolanaPayURI
Direct Known Subclasses:
SolanaPayTransactionRequest, SolanaPayTransferRequest
public abstract class SolanaPayURI extends Object
Base class for parsed Solana Pay Uri

      protected SolanaPayURI(@NonNull Uri uri)

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public static SolanaPayURI parse(@NonNull Uri uri)
      Try and parse the given Uri as any of the known Solana Pay formats: SolanaPayTransferRequest or SolanaPayTransactionRequest
      Parameters:
      uri - the Solana Pay Uri to parse
      Returns:
      a SolanaPayURI concrete subclass
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if uri cannot be parsed as a Solana Pay Uri

    • isBase58EncodedPublicKeyLikeValue

      protected static boolean isBase58EncodedPublicKeyLikeValue(@NonNull String s)
      Utility method to verify that the provided string is a valid base58-encoded Ed25519 public key-like value. Note that this only checks that it is a key-like value; it doesn't verify that the value represents a point on any particular elliptic curve.
      Parameters:
      s - the candidate value to verify
      Returns:
      true if s is a valid base58-encoded Ed25519 public key-like value
